Koch Industries, Inc. All rights reserved.

Wouldn’t it be great if your IT fit?

You information technology folks are, um, different. You know it. And so do we. You are blessed with a set of skills that allow the rest of us “normals” to function. Koch offers the variety and flexibility for you to find the perfect place to practice your art.

Open Roles

Find your fit.

You don’t have to choose between a job that’s stable but boring, or creative but volatile. With our variety of businesses and positions available, you’re sure to find the role that’s right for your unique talents.

Gain access to opportunities and career paths across 12 diverse industries.

  • 7 petabytes of data
  • 6,500 Servers Managed
  • 7,500 Applications Used
  • 21,739 Mobile Devices Managed

Koch companies do not solicit potential candidates by text message and do not request financial or banking information at any time during the interview process.
